post.body: we will meet someday. I don't have any reason to be my surely with you
heading out. car heated and ready to go. :) If I don't come back just want everyone to know I'll miss them
I am glad you don't get it. I have been known to use that phrase even in public, even @respres at a conference
a happy winter solstice to you. good time to sleep, until spring :)
an unusual way to spend a saturday night but if you are having fun what the heck
have fun and stay warm ;)
better now than in july
careful not to throw out your back or have a heart attack and get a snow blower.
it is still snowing. We are waiting untill we get another foot of the stuff
It was a pleasure for me as well. Have a merry and a happy yourself . . in your flip flops. :)
it just got worse. white out now. the winds are blowing. I am also in t-shirt, shorts and flip flops I just stay in
and the snow continues.
@JoSoss just figured out this conversation. There are advantages to "outside blogs" and I strongly encourage tham
Moving way too slow tick tock
going Christmas shopping cuz what doesn't kill us makes us stronger
http://twitpic.com/u1y0 - It looks a little to happy and perky to be my logo
Watching cars get stuck in the snow
Warming feet after step shoveling
Watching it snow.
